SELECT dtls.mssageId , dtls.sndngResultCode , dtls.recptnPerson , dtls.rcver , dtls.sj , dtls.sndngDe , dtls.atchFileId FROM ( SELECT mssage_id AS mssageId , (SELECT code_nm FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE use_at = 'Y' AND code_id = 'COM024' AND code = sndng_result_code) AS sndngResultCode , sndr AS sndr , rcver AS rcver , sj AS sj , dsptch_dt AS sndngDe , atch_file_id AS atchFileId FROM COMTHEMAILDSPTCHMANAGE WHERE 1=1
sj LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
email_cn LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
sndr LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%')
ORDER BY mssage_id DESC ) dtls WHERE 1 = 1 LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#
